info.title: Auth Gateway
info.description: Auth Microservice having APIs for user authentication, authorization, creation etc

post.description: This API allows users to log in with their username and password

get.description: This API allows to retrive the users

roles.name: Provider
roles.description: All users with the 'Provider' role will appear as options in the default Infopath

post.description: This API allows to create a new user with given details

get.description: This API allows to retrive the user detail

parameters.name: user_uuid
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user to fetch the details

200.description: Retrive the single user by Uuid

roles.name: Provider
roles.description: All users with the 'Provider' role will appear as options in the default Infopath

post.description: This API allows to update a user with given details

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user to update the user detail

delete.description: This API allows to delete the user

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user to delete

post.description: This API checks if a user exists with the given username
This API allows to reset the user password from admin

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user to reset password

get.description: This API allows to get the providers

parameters.name: user_uuid
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user to get the provider
